docs.title: docs-versioning V0.0.3rc1
docs.text: This file will become your README and also the index of your documentation.

docs.title: How to use
docs.text:
Fill me in please! Don’t forget code examples:

1+1

2

docs.title: Docs_Versioning.html
docs.text:
from typer.testing import CliRunner

runner = CliRunner()

all_branches="0.0.5rc10 [dev]\n0.0.5dev\n0.0.5rc0\n0.0.4 [latest]\n0.0.3\n0.0.2\n0.0.1\n"
expected='0.0.5rc10\n0.0.5dev\n0.0.5rc0'
actual = _filter_rc_branches(all_branches)
print(actual)
assert actual == expected

0.0.5rc10
0.0.5dev
0.0.5rc0

all_branches="0.0.4 [latest]\n0.0.3\n0.0.2\n0.0.1\n"
expected=''
actual = _filter_rc_branches(all_branches)
print(actual)
assert actual == expected

all_versions='0.0.5rc10 [dev]\n0.0.5dev\n0.0.5rc0'
expected = ['0.0.5rc10', '0.0.5dev', '0.0.5rc0']

actual = _get_version_numbers(all_versions)
print(actual)
assert actual == expected

['0.0.5rc10', '0.0.5dev', '0.0.5rc0']

versions_to_delete = ['0.0.5rc1', '0.0.5rc0']
exclude = "0.0.5rc1 [dev], 0.0.5rc0 [old-dev]"
expected = []

actual = _filter_exclustion_list(versions_to_delete, exclude)
print(actual)
assert actual == expected

versions_to_delete = ['0.0.5rc1', '0.0.5rc0', '0.0.1rc0']
exclude = "0.0.5rc1 [dev], 0.0.5rc0 [old-dev]"
expected = ['0.0.1rc0']

actual = _filter_exclustion_list(versions_to_delete, exclude)
print(actual)
assert actual == expected

[]
['0.0.1rc0']

cmd=["-b", "branch"]
rebase = True
ignore = False
prefix = "path"
expected = ["-b", "branch", "--rebase", "--prefix", "path"]

actual = _add_git_args(cmd, rebase, ignore, prefix)
print(actual)
assert actual == expected

cmd=["-b", "branch"]
rebase = False
ignore = True
prefix = "path"
expected = ["-b", "branch", "--ignore", "--prefix", "path"]

actual = _add_git_args(cmd, rebase, ignore, prefix)
print(actual)
assert actual == expected

cmd=["-b", "branch"]
rebase = True
ignore = True
prefix = None
expected = ["-b", "branch", "--rebase", "--ignore"]

actual = _add_git_args(cmd, rebase, ignore, prefix)
print(actual)
assert actual == expected

['-b', 'branch', '--rebase', '--prefix', 'path']
['-b', 'branch', '--ignore', '--prefix', 'path']
['-b', 'branch', '--rebase', '--ignore']

docs.title: delete_rc_docs
docs.text:
delete_rc_docs (branch:str=<typer.models.OptionInfo object at
                 0x7fe7f40acc10>, remote:str=<typer.models.OptionInfo

                 object at 0x7fe7f40acb50>,
                 ignore:bool=<typer.models.OptionInfo object at
                 0x7fe7f40acb20>, prefix:str=<typer.models.OptionInfo
                 object at 0x7fe7f40acaf0>)

Delete the deployed release candidate documentations.

result = runner.invoke(_app, input="3")
print(result.stdout)
assert result.exit_code == 0, result.exit_code

List of deployed release candidate documentation versions: 
0.0.5rc1
0.0.5rc0


Select an option: 
1. Delete all versions listed above 
2. Retain some versions while deleting others 
3. Abort

: 3
Aborted.

docs.title: CHANGELOG.md file not found.
docs.text:
To generate the changelog file, please run the following command from the project root directory. 

nbdev_changelog

If you do not want this page to be rendered as part of the documentation, please remove the following line from the mkdocs/summary_template.txt file and build the docs again.

- [Releases]{changelog}

docs.title: docs
docs.text:
Delete the deployed release candidate documentations.

Usage:

$ docs [OPTIONS]

Options:

  • -b, --branch TEXT: The branch name to commit to [default: gh-pages]
  • -r, --remote TEXT: The origin name to push to [default: origin]
  • -F, --config-file TEXT: The MkDocs configuration file to use [default: mkdocs/mkdocs.yml]
  • --rebase / --no-rebase: Rebase with remote brancj [default: rebase]
  • --ignore / --no-ignore: Ignore remote status [default: no-ignore]
  • --prefix TEXT: subdirectory within {branch} where docs are located
  • --install-completion: Install completion for the current shell.
  • --show-completion: Show completion for the current shell, to copy it or customize the installation.
  • --help: Show this message and exit.
